name: That Car Game
description:
Objectives

NormalMode: Get to the finishline as fast as possible.

HardMode: Switch on all checkpoints and make it back to the startline.

Controls 

Dualshock 4 compatible (Reload the page after plugin please)

ActionButtonGo ForwardsUp / W / Right triggerGo BackwardsDown / S / Left triggerSteeringLeft & Right / A & D / Left StickBrakesSpacebar / Left BumperChange Camera ViewC / Right BumperPauseP / Options

Edit #1: The game is on early development and only the first 10 levels have been completed + a test area level. However it's planned that the final release of the game contains at least 30 more levels.

That Car Game is a maze racing game in which, yes you guessed it... have to race in a maze as fast as possible to the finish line while traversing interesting levels.

If you like to share any feature for the game, car model you want to see in game or simply see how this game evolves please click the follow button and enjoy :)

Edit #2: Second wave of levels, added 10 levels! only 20 to go for the alpha version release :)

Also improved the test area and added free 360º gravity shifts, finally reworked the portals so it feels more natural instead of a fixed angle a.k.a "Speedy thing goes in, speedy thing comes out" ;)

Edit #3: Third and final set of levels for early access. That makes a total of 40 levels and nearly 30 minutes of playtime for each mode!

I added a save feature for your time on every level, also a challenge time (best times I did on my first whole run) if you feel the need of competitiveness.

Finally I can start working on the visual aspect of the game. I already added some new super awesome High Poly tyres, check it out!

Don't forget to rate, write a comment and share your thoughts of the game with the hashtag #thatcargame
